entry.title: bitcoin-dev list etiquette
entry.summary: A member of the Bitcoin community, Theo Chino, expressed his love for Bitcoin as it combines politics and technical aspects. The conversation in the thread revolves around political issues related to Bitcoin, with some members suggesting that politics is becoming a bigger challenge than technical issues. Eric Lombrozo stated that until the political issues are resolved, technical discussions will be purely philosophical. Alex Morcos wrote about the excessive amount of non-technical discussion on the mailing list and appealed for individual self-restraint to help increase the signal-to-noise ratio. The context also includes links to a Facebook group discussing Bitcoin politics in New York State and an article about a French Robin Hood who used Bitcoin in New York.
